scripts.ultra-clean: cd /Users/heidaraliy/Documents/programs/SilkForest/ rm -rf node_modules rm -rf rimraf node_modules /*/node_modules rm -rf apps/*/node_modules rm -rf apps/*/dist yarn cache clean
scripts.reinstall: yarn ultra-clean && yarn install && yarn build && cd utils && set -x && bash extraction_writer.sh
scripts.vercel-build: yarn install && yarn workspace silkforest-web build
